nodes.text: The Jai'galaar blaster was a type of Mandalorian blaster developed by MandalTech. It shared its name with the Mando'a word for shriek-hawk.

The Jai'galaar blaster was first mentioned in Sabine My Rebel Sketchbook, a reference book written by Daniel Wallace and published in 2015. It identifies Wren's weapons as Jai'galaar blasters made by MandalTech instead of WESTAR-35 blaster pistols by Concordian Crescent Technologies. As Star Wars Rebels: The Visual Guide, Rebel Journal by Ezra Bridger—another 2014 reference book by Wallace—and the official Star Wars Rebels Facebook page identify the weapons as WESTARs, this article assumes those sources are correct.
